about_the_game:
"The Last Barbarian" — is a third-person action role-playing game. You are encouraged by the game to proceed with caution, learn from past mistakes, or find alternate areas to explore. If you are not careful, monsters will be able to have sex with you and you will have to start from the very beginning.

“The Last Barbarian” takes place in a fantasy N'ul-realm, plunged into darkness and debauchery after the arrival of the ancient Goddess of Flesh. She gives everyone what they want most. But she distorts all desires and so the whole world is plunged into perversion and violence. Everything around is nourished by sexual energy.

The protagonist of the game woke up in the dungeon after the battle with the orcs in her village. She is the last barbarian from a tribe of local Amazons. They never submitted to anyone and valued only their freedom and love. But now she is driven by a thirst for revenge and a desire to revive her tribe.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains scenes of sex between fantasy creatures such orcs, elves, trolls, tentacles, evil cultists and elder gods. 
The main character of the game will be a part of these scenes. 
This game contains scenes of unmotivated violence, using alcohol and drugs, pregnancy and unnatural birth giving.  All characters are mature.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 645
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

name: The Last Barbarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: "The Last Barbarian" — is a third-person action role-playing adult game. You are encouraged by the game to proceed with caution, learn from past mistakes, or find alternate areas to explore. Find different locations, new friends and dangerous enemies.
